entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -3.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
